critical_workflows: Initiate a Purchase using Klarna Payments

test_scenarios.name: Successful Account Creation and Login
steps: Provide valid email, password, and personal information.
Verify email address via link sent to provided email.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged into their Klarna account dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: Successful Purchase using Klarna
steps: Navigate to a partner merchant website.
Choose 'Pay later' option (or any default available option).
test_scenarios.expected_result: Purchase is successfully initiated with Klarna and order confirmation is displayed on merchant website.
